reviews.review: Classic first person , one of my favorites

I think that this game holds up even for being so old and i think it never gets old because they still update the game and that makes it fresh even if the graphics is a bit old. 
One thing is that there are a lot of hackers and that just brings the game down a bit, but you could just buy like premium or something for 10 bucks (i think) and that will basically get rid of hackers. Other then the cheaters, its a god game and you should try it.

Yes this is a fun game. However, not online, not against the "average joe", or the unknown player who is always on the top of the list..

Sadly enough, still too many cheaters around. Yes VAC does function, but to a limit however.
First time I played Counter-Strike, it was a mod, bundled together with Half-Life (well actually even before this I had played it, in it's beta stages).

Played it long enough and took a long break from the game itself.

So back now, the game (base version) is free. Well since I do have money, I bought the addons, a bunch of StatTrak weapons and started playing.

Sure, it does state that I have played for almost 150Hrs. But that is not true, I have played it for years, before all this cosmetic changes were made..


To sum it all up: Get it free, play it free. And when You are done with it - forget it.
